mapper.insert: insert into summary_daily_trx(trx_date, trx_code, trx_group, bank_code, amount) select #{trxDate}, trx_code, trx_group, bank_code, count(1) as trx_amount from ${tableName} group by trx_code, trx_group, bank_code
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM information_schema.tables x inner join (select database() as db) y on x.table_schema = y.db WHERE table_name = #{value}
